description:
Rapidly growing boutique tax firm located in Encino is seeking a tax preparer to begin as soon as possible.

Job requirements include:

  • College degree (accounting background preferred),
  • 1-3 years of tax experience.

An ideal candidate will be:

  • Able to think proactively and problem solve,
  • Able to work in a fast-paced environment,
  • Able to multi-task various assignments,
  • Have excellent communication skills,
  • Have excellent organizational skills,
  • Be high energy and personable,
  • Be motivated and hardworking,
  • Be career oriented.

You will be the 5th person in our close-nit team & will be working directly with the owner. You will have a tremendous opportunity to learn about tax, businesses, and what it takes to be a tax professional. We offer the opportunity to continue your tax education and career advancement.

Benefits include:

  • Bonus and raise opportunity twice a year,
  • 401(k) w/ match,
  • Health Insurance
  • Student loan interest reimbursements,
  • Tuition reimbursement for related courses,
  • Flexible PTO,
  • Lunch provided daily during tax season & frequently during other periods,
  • Team oriented and fun work environment.
